ygData.subject: RE: Dwarven Cleric
ygData.msgSnippet: Here s what I have now and what I will upgrade to when I get the time/money: Savant s Cap ac 2, +3 int/wis -- Runed Circlet ac 4, +4 int/wis Silver Ruby Vail
ygData.messageBody:
Here's what I have now and what I will upgrade to when I get the time/money:

Savant's Cap ac 2, +3 int/wis
--> Runed Circlet ac 4, +4 int/wis
Silver Ruby Vail +4 str/wis
--> Platinum Ruby Vail +7 str/wis
Black Iron Medallion +3 int/wis
--> Chrysoberyl Talisman ac 5, +3 wis, +20 mana
Lizardscale Mantle ac 5, +3 int/wis
--> Adamantite Epolets ac 9, +7 wis
Bloodstained Tunic ac 13, +4 agi/wis
--> Mithril-Runed Tunic ac 10, +3 sta, +5 wis
Mammoth Hide Cloak ac 7, +4 wis, +5 cold
Gatorscale Leggings ac 7, +4 wis, +15 hp


Drizben D'Vorn
Defiled Priest of Innoruuk
Propagator of Hate


> From: "Aaron Mattingly" <kistoga123@...>
>
> I am a lvl 15 dwarven cleric. I have 147wis, but i still want more. How
> much do Gatorscale Leggings go for? Also any +wis items that could be
> listed
> would be very helpful. Thx
>
> Drado
> lvl 15 Cleric
> of Brell Serillis
>
